com.aptima.netstorm.algorithms.aptima.bp.mismatch

Class NormalizedMismatchCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aptima.netstorm.algorithms.aptima.bp.mismatch.NormalizedMismatchCalculator

  • public class NormalizedMismatchCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
    Assigns node and link mismatch values so that the mismatch for the network is calculated as follows: C_network = C_attribute * num_mismatched_attr + sum(linkNotPresentMismatch)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NormalizedMismatchCalculator(AttributedModelNode[] modelNodes, AttributedModelRelation[] modelRelations)
      Constructor that initliazes the model nodes and links to compute the normalized mismatch number of node attributes, link attributes, total number of attributes, penalizations are all set in here
